  2. Girl groups
  3. Choa & Way

Choa

Way

Introduction

On September 29, 2014, Chrome Entertainment announced the first sub-unit for the South Korean girl group Crayon Pop, Strawberry Milk consisting of twins Choa and Way. They debuted on October 15, 2014 with their debut mini album, The 1st Mini Album. On September 5, 2019, the duo released their single, My Universe as Choa & Way instead of Strawberry Milk.
